greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number triangle T(n,k) = binomial(n,k)*binomial(2n,n-k).
comment: First column is A000984. Second column is A110609 = n^2*A000108. Row sums are A005809.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows, flattened
formula: n-th row polynomial R(n,t) = [x^n] ( (1 + t*x)*(1 + x)^2 )^n.
Cf. A008459, whose n-th row polynomial is equal to [x^n] ( (1 + t*x)*(1 + x) )^n.
program: (PARI) for(n=0,10, for(k=0,n, print1(binomial(n,k)*binomial(2*n,n-k), ", "))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 01 2017
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 30 2005
